nodes.text: Merish Alze was a Human female who served as an officer in the Imperial Reclamation Service of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, she was stationed in the Imperial base camp.

Merish first appeared in the 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Classic Gear Vendor on Ilum for the Empire. The Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide provided a last name of "Alze" for her.
